description: A side-scrolling runner where 1 or 2 hacker monkeys collect 2xx success codes while avoiding 4xx/5xx HTTP error codes. Use double jump to navigate obstacles. Collect bananas to activate PLATANUS HACK MODE â€” stack up to 3 bananas for extended immunity and automatic projectile shooting that collects codes and destroys enemies for points. Difficulty increases with faster speeds and complex patterns. Race against the 120-second timer!
